languages.text: Где-то на изнанке мира сотканная из множества чужих измерений Комморра как и прежде была освещена светом краденных солнц, и улицы ее были полны агонии и криков. Какие бы несчастья ни истязали Темный город, следы от них обратились шрамами на его жестоком лике и затерялись среди тысяч других уродливых рубцов. Пока боль пульсировала в залитых кровью шпилях, ненасытная и незыблемая Комморра продолжала плыть в Паутине, а вместе с ней жил и ее неизменный правитель, повелитель кабала Черного Сердца и опаснейший из всех темных эльдаров — Асдрубаэль Вект.

Somewhere on the underside of reality lay Commorragh, woven from manifold other dimensions and illuminated as always with the light of stolen suns, its streets ever filled with screams and agony. Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.
languages.original_text: Где-то на изнанке мира сотканная из множества чужих измерений Комморра как и прежде была освещена светом краденных солнц, и улицы ее были полны агонии и криков. Какие бы несчастья ни истязали Темный город, следы от них обратились шрамами на его жестоком лике и затерялись среди тысяч других уродливых рубцов. Пока боль пульсировала в залитых кровью шпилях, ненасытная и незыблемая Комморра продолжала плыть в Паутине, а вместе с ней жил и ее неизменный правитель, повелитель кабала Черного Сердца и опаснейший из всех темных эльдаров — Асдрубаэль Вект.

traits.locale_text: Somewhere on the inverse of the universe, Commorragh, weaved from many other dimensions, as always was illuminated with the light of stolen suns, and her streets were still filled with screams and agony. No matter what misfortune befell the Dark City, the traces it left turned into scars on the City's brutal face, and got lost among thousands of other vile marks. As long as pain pulsed in the blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakable Commorragh continued its flight among the Webway, and with it continued its unchanging ruler, the leader of Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Dark Eldar — Asdrubael Vect.

Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.

languages.text: 科摩罗坐落在这个宇宙的背面，由无数其他维度编织而成。盗窃而来的恒星散发着明亮的光芒，照耀着它充满了尖叫与痛苦的街道。这座黑暗之城所经历的任何不幸，都会为它可怖的面容添上新的伤疤，随后湮没在无数丑恶的污点之中。只要被鲜血浸透的尖塔上还搏动着痛苦，永不餍足、永不动摇的科摩罗就会继续在网道中存续。与之同样永生不朽的，还有它那亘古不变的统治者，黑心阴谋团的领袖，最危险的黑暗灵族——阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特。
languages.original_text: Somewhere on the underside of reality lay Commorragh, woven from manifold other dimensions and illuminated as always with the light of stolen suns, its streets ever filled with screams and agony. Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.

traits.locale_text: 科摩罗坐落在这个宇宙的背面，由无数其他维度编织而成的。被窃来的恒星散发着明亮的光芒，照耀着它充满了尖叫与痛苦的街道。这座黑暗之城所经历的任何不幸，都会为它可怖的面容添上新的伤疤，随后湮没在无数丑恶的污点之中。只要被鲜血浸透的尖塔上还搏动着痛苦，永不满足、永不动摇的科摩罗就会继续在网道中存续。与之同样永生不朽的，还有它那亘古不变的统治者，黑心阴谋团的领袖，最危险的黑暗灵族——阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特。

languages.text: Irgendwo auf der Unterseite der Realität lag Commorragh, gewebt aus unzähligen anderen Dimensionen, und erhellt wie immer vom Licht gestohlener Sonnen, seine Straßen ewiglich erfüllt von Schreien und Qualen. Jedes Missgeschick, dass die Dunkle Stadt befiel, wurde zu einer weiteren Narbe auf ihrem abstoßenden Gesicht, unter Tausenden von anderen widerwärtigen Makeln kaum zu sehen. So lange in seinen blutgetränkten Türmen noch Schmerzen pulsierten, so lange setzte das unersättliche und unerschütterliche Commorragh seinen Flug durch das Netz der Tausend Tore fort. Und mit ihm der ewigliche Herrscher über diese Hölle, der Anführer der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens, der gefährlichste aller Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.
languages.original_text: Somewhere on the underside of reality lay Commorragh, woven from manifold other dimensions and illuminated as always with the light of stolen suns, its streets ever filled with screams and agony. Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.

traits.locale_text: Irgendwo auf der Rückseite des Universums lag Commorragh, gewebt aus unzähligen anderen Dimensionen, und erhellt wie immer vom Licht gestohlener Sonnen, seine Straßen ewiglich erfüllt von Schreien und Qualen. Jedes Missgeschick, dass die Dunkle Stadt befiel, wurde zu einer weiteren Narbe auf ihrem abstoßenden Gesicht, unter Tausenden von anderen widerwärtigen Makeln kaum zu sehen. So lange in seinen blutgetränkten Türmen noch Schmerzen pulsierten, so lange setzte das unersättliche und unerschütterliche Commorragh seinen Flug durch das Netz der Tausend Tore fort. Und mit ihm der ewigliche Herrscher über diese Hölle, der Anführer der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens, der gefährlichste aller Dunklen Eldar — Asdrubael Vect.

languages.text: Quelque part sur l'envers de la réalité demeurait Commorragh, tissée à partir de multiples autres dimensions, ses rues résonnant comme toujours de hurlements de douleur sous la lumière de soleils volés. Tout malheur vécu par la Cité Crépusculaire restait gravé comme une nouvelle cicatrice sur son épouvantable visage, rejoignant des milliers de marques hideuses. Tant que la souffrance imprégnait ses tours ensanglantées, l'insatiable et implacable Commorragh poursuivait son voyage à travers la Toile sous la férule de son immuable souverain : Asdrubael Vect, le chef de la Kabale du Cœur Noir et le plus dangereux de tous les Drukharis.
languages.original_text: Somewhere on the underside of reality lay Commorragh, woven from manifold other dimensions and illuminated as always with the light of stolen suns, its streets ever filled with screams and agony. Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.

traits.locale_text: Quelque part sur l’envers de l'univers demeurait Commorragh, tissée à partir de multiples autres dimensions, ses rues résonnant comme toujours de hurlements de douleur sous la lumière de soleils volés. Tout malheur vécu par la Cité Crépusculaire restait gravé comme une nouvelle cicatrice sur son épouvantable visage, rejoignant des milliers de marques hideuses. Tant que la souffrance imprégnait ses tours ensanglantées, l’insatiable et implacable Commorragh poursuivait son voyage à travers la Toile sous la férule de son immuable souverain : Asdrubael Vect, le chef de la Kabale du Cœur Noir et le plus dangereux de tous les Drukharis.

languages.text: En algún lugar a la inversa de la realidad se encuentra Commorragh, tejida a partir de otras dimensiones e iluminada siempre por la luz de soles robados, con calles llenas de gritos y agonía. Todo el sufrimiento que se vive en la Ciudad Siniestra se convierte en otra cicatriz en su rostro desfigurado, perdida entre miles de otras viles marcas. Mientras el dolor recorra sus agujas ensangrentadas, la insaciable y perenne Commorragh continuará su viaje por la Telaraña bajo el control de su dirigente inmutable, el líder de la Kábala del Corazón Negro y el más peligroso de todos los Drukhari: Asdrubael Vect.
languages.original_text: Somewhere on the underside of reality lay Commorragh, woven from manifold other dimensions and illuminated as always with the light of stolen suns, its streets ever filled with screams and agony. Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.

traits.locale_text: En algún lugar a la inversa del universo se encuentra Commorragh, tejida a partir de otras dimensiones e iluminada siempre por la luz de soles robados, con calles llenas de gritos y agonía. Todo el sufrimiento que se vive en la Ciudad Siniestra se convierte en otra cicatriz en su rostro desfigurado, perdida entre miles de otras viles marcas. Mientras el dolor recorra sus agujas ensangrentadas, la insaciable y perenne Commorragh continuará su viaje por la Telaraña bajo el control de su dirigente inmutable, el líder de la Kábala del Corazón Negro y el más peligroso de todos los Eldar Oscuros: Asdrubael Vect.

languages.text: 世界の裏側のどこかにコモラフはあった。無数の異次元から織り成され、常に盗まれた太陽の光で照らし出され、その街の通りは常に悲鳴と苦痛に満ちていた。仄暗き都が経験したどんな不幸も、その恐ろしい顔に刻まれたもう一つの傷跡となり、他の何千もの忌まわしい傷跡に紛れて消えていった。その血に染まった尖塔に苦痛が脈打つ限り、飽くことなく揺るぎないコモラフは、その不変の支配者、 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉のリーダーであり、デュカーリの中で最も危険な存在であるアスドルバエル・ヴェクトとともに、網辻を飛び続けた。
languages.original_text: Somewhere on the underside of reality lay Commorragh, woven from manifold other dimensions and illuminated as always with the light of stolen suns, its streets ever filled with screams and agony. Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.

traits.locale_text: 世界の裏側のどこかにコモラフはあった。無数の異次元から織り成され、常に盗まれた太陽の光で照らし出され、その街の通りは常に悲鳴と苦痛に満ちていた。仄暗き都が経験したどんな不幸も、その恐ろしい顔に刻まれたもう一つの傷跡となり、他の何千もの忌まわしい傷跡に紛れて消えていった。その血に染まった尖塔に苦痛が脈打つ限り、飽くことなく揺るぎないコモラフは、その不変の支配者、 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉のリーダーであり、デュカーリの中で最も危険な存在であるアスドルバエル・ヴェクトとともに、網辻を飛び続けた。

languages.text: Gerçekliğin öte yüzünde; birçok boyuttan örülüp her daim çalınan güneşlerin ışığıyla aydınlatılan, sokakları çığlık ve ızdıraptan geçilmeyen Commorragh bulunuyordu. Kara Şehir'in yaşadığı her talihsizlik, onun korkunç görünümüne bir yara izi daha ekliyor ve bu izler, binlerce özür ve lekenin arasında kayboluyordu. Doymak ve sarsılmak bilmeyen Commorragh, kana bulanmış kulelerinde acı var oldukça Ağyol'daki uçuşuna devam etmekteydi. Değişmeyen hükümdarı, Kara Yürek Kabalı'nın lideri ve tüm Drukharilerin en tehlikelisi Asdrubael Vect de başındaydı.
languages.original_text: Somewhere on the underside of reality lay Commorragh, woven from manifold other dimensions and illuminated as always with the light of stolen suns, its streets ever filled with screams and agony. Any misfortune experienced by the Dark City became another scar on its appalling face, lost among thousands of other vile blemishes. As long as pain pulsed in its blood-soaked spires, the insatiable and unshakeable Commorragh continued its flight through the Webway, along with its unchanging ruler, the leader of the Kabal of the Black Heart and the most dangerous of all Drukhari — Asdrubael Vect.

traits.locale_text: Gerçekliğin alt kısımlarında bir yerde Commorragh bulunur. Diğer boyutların parçalarından bir araya gelmiştir ve her daim çalınan güneşlerin ışığıyla aydınlatılmaktadır, sokakları her daim çığlık ve ızdırapla doludur. Kara Şehir'in yaşadığı her talihsizlik, onun korkunç görünümüne bir yara izi daha eklemiştir ve bu izler, binlerce diğer çirkinliğin arasında kaybolmuştur. Kana bulanmış kulelerinde acı var oldukça, doymak bilmez ve sarsılmak bilmez Commorragh, Ağyol'daki uçuşuna devam etmiştir. Değişmeyen hükümdarı, Siyah Yürek Kabalı'nın lideri ve tüm Drukharilerin en tehlikelisi Asdrubael Vect'le birlikte.
